name: Qasir al-Wasat: International Edition
summary:
Qasir al-Wasat is a stealth action-adventure set in a mysterious 12th Century Syrian palace.
Play as an invisible and fragile creature summoned from another world to complete an assassination mission inside an enigmatic palace. Search for hidden messages, eavesdrop the fortress' guards conversations and look for secret passages since not everything is as it seems and there are ancient treasures waiting to be found.

name: Qasir Al-Wasat: A Night in-Between
summary: Qasir Al-Wasat: A Night in-Between tells the story of an invisible and frail creature which is summoned on 12th century Syria for a mission of infiltration and assassination, where it investigates and discovers the secrets of a wondrous palace and a trap that was set for it. The game employs simple mechanics and conceptual sounds and visuals.

name: QAD: Quintessential Art of Destruction
summary: A sci-fi flight sim for PC. PlayStation and Saturn versions of the game were in development but eventually cancelled.

name: Qajary Cat
summary: The Qajar Cat is the story of a mother cat together with her kitten which, accidentally, becomes the apple of the Iranian King's eye. The King (Naser al-Din Shah Qajar) takes it under his roof and bestows all kinds of lavish royal blessings to it. Becoming jealous of the cat, the women in the harem steal it by way of a nocturnal plot and throw it down a well to get rid of it. This is the vicissitudinous story of this cat to get back to the King's court.

name: Qanga
summary: Qanga is a science fiction game about exploration and survival in the solar system. Synchronize your consciousness in a cyborg provided from ICLab's Industry labs and explore this universe!

name: Q&A: A Light-Roasted Romance
summary: A kooky barista? A mysterious guest? A kranky robot? I wonder whose side you are on reader! Who you root for and which choices you make will determine how this story turns out, so get ready...

name: Qavo
summary: Qavo is a 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate a cube through various sliding-block puzzles filled with deadly obstacles.

name: Q: A Dystopian Queueing Simulator
summary: An experimental horror game about waiting in line for... well, you'll have to play it to find out.

name: Q: A Neon Platformer
summary: Jump into a neon-filled platformer world as Q and overcome a gauntlet of tricky platform challenges.

name: QamaQ
summary: Master the Ancient God's powers in an action-filled little game.

name: Qabara the Artist
summary: An RPG adventure about the world's most anxious 9-year-old painter.

name: QatQi
summary:
You know that feeling you get when you finish every path and cover every square inch of a map in an RPG? When you apply that concept to the word game genre, you get QatQi.

The levels in QatQi are designed with many large, open rooms, much like dungeons. There are several gold coins hidden in each of those rooms, and discovering them will result in massive score bonuses. You can view a detailed breakdown of your performance for each level you complete, including factors such as word length, effectiveness, and gold coins, among others.

name: Qallupilluit
summary: The Qallupilluit has kidnapped your brother and taken him to his cave, can you find him while being pursued? Based on the Inuit mith of the Qualupalik a tale about a sea witch that lives in the cold waters and drag children to their lair, told to children in order to stop them from getting close to the freezing waters and falling in.

name: Qazaq: Son of the Sun
summary: Qazaq: Son of the Sun - a single-player first-person open-world game with puzzles set in Kazakhstan, where you are the last surviving Qazaq saved by the Sun God.
